== Vadakkumkara (CT) (627932) ==

Vadakkumkara (CT) is a town in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 6.64 sq. km. and harbouring 2669 households with total population of 10407 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 31 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 280 km. Male population is 4862 and female population is 5545. Scheduled Caste population is 1077 and Scheduled Tribes population is 14. Census Location Code of the town is 627932<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 31 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 55 km. Railway station is at Irinjalakuda at a distance of 8 km.
